Name: choroiditis
Definition: A primary bacterial infectious disease that is characterized by sore throat

Name: obsolete syphilitic disseminated chorioretinitis
Definition: A primary bacterial infectious disease that is characterized by sore throat

Name: obsolete alternating exotropia with V pattern
Definition: A primary bacterial infectious disease that is characterized by sore throat

Name: obsolete Trichomonas urethritis
Definition: A Trichomonas vaginalis trichomoniasis that involves inflammation of the urethra caused by Trichomonas vaginalis

Name: gyrate atrophy
Definition: An ovarian disease that is characterized by irregular or absent ovulation.

Name: choroideremia
Definition: A vasculitis that is characterized by necrotizing inflammation of medium or small arteries.
